content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Maria Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Hello Maria, thank you for coming to see the apartment. I understand that you are interested in renting it, and I am eager to discuss the rental price with you. May I know how much you are willing to pay per month for this apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am willing to pay 1200 Euros per month. However, I am not sure if that is a fair price given the size of the apartment, which is only 25 square meters. I would like to know if there is any room for negotiation on the price.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you for your offer, Maria. While 1200 Euros is certainly a generous amount, I must admit that it is higher than what I was expecting for a 25-square-meter apartment. I would be willing to consider a lower rental price, but I am still trying to maximize my gains as a landlord. May I ask if you have any flexibility in your budget?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Yes, I can negotiate. I am open to discussing a lower rental price. How about 1000 Euros per month?

I understand that it is a small apartment, but I am willing to pay a fair price for it. I am also willing to sign a long-term lease to show my commitment to the property.

I am also aware that utilities are not included in the rental price, but I am willing to pay for them separately. I am just looking for a fair rental price for the apartment.

I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us. Please let me know if you have any counteroffers or if you need any additional information from me.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you for your willingness to negotiate, Maria. While 1000 Euros per month is certainly a fair price for a 25-square-meter apartment, I must admit that I am still trying to maximize my gains as a landlord. However, I am open to discussing a lower rental price if it means that we can reach an agreement that works for both of us. name: Heinrich Heine
